alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Idaho County through 215 PM PDT... At 152 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 36 miles east of Riggins, or 39 miles southeast of Grangeville, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dixie, Mackay Bar and Orogrande. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
